meanings.definition: A board game involving the moving of pieces around a track
meanings.sent1: During our family game night, we played pachisis and had a lot of fun.
meanings.sent2: The children gathered around the table to play pachisis together.
meanings.sent3: In the pachisis tournament, the youngest player surprised everyone with their strategic moves.
meanings.sent4: Life can sometimes feel like a game of pachisis, with unexpected twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pachisis board made the game even more exciting for the players.

meanings.definition: The act of playing the board game Pachisi
meanings.sent1: After school, the friends enjoyed a quick game of pachisis before heading home.
meanings.sent2: The pachisis championship attracted players from all over the town.
meanings.sent3: The pachisis enthusiasts organized a special event to celebrate their favorite game.
meanings.sent4: Playing pachisis together strengthened the bond between the siblings.
meanings.sent5: The sound of dice rolling added an element of suspense to the pachisis game.
